tip: Forgot your password? Don't worry, we forgot it too!
Can't remember your username? Try 'admin'. It's always admin.
If at first you don't succeed, try re-entering your password another 10 times. It might work!
Why login when you can just stay logged out and live life on the edge?
Don't like your password? Just add a '1' to the end. It's like a free security upgrade!
If you can't figure out your password, just ask your pet. They probably know it better than you do.
